name: watson-developer-cloud
description: Client library to use the IBM Watson Services and AlchemyAPI

0.9.1.name: watson-developer-cloud

scripts.test: mocha --reporter spec --timeout 4000
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

1.1.0.name: watson-developer-cloud
1.1.0.description: Client library to use the IBM Watson Services and AlchemyAPI

scripts.test: jshint --exclude ./node_modules/ && mocha --reporter spec --timeout 4000
scripts.watch-doc: nodemon --watch lib/ --watch services/ --watch jsdoc/ --watch package.json --ext js,tmpl --exec npm run doc
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

scripts.watch-doc: nodemon --watch ./ --ext js,tmpl,json --ignore dist/ --ignore doc/ --ignore test/ --ignore examples/ --exec npm run doc
